argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nexd.1 | |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) |
| 2 |  | nexd.2 | |- ( ph -> -. ps ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_alrimih | |- ( ph -> A. x -. ps ) |
| 4 |  | #P_alnex | |- ( A. x -. ps <-> -. E. x ps ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> -. E. x ps ) |
\
 Deduction for generalization rule for negated wff.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.)
